value.original: Java or Javascript that handles the process execution

row.value: Java or Javascript that handles the process execution

value.original: Handler can be: *A JavaScript function in case of "Manual" UI Pattern processes. This function is invoked when the process is executed. *An Java class implementing ActionHandler. This java class is invoked when the process is executed.

row.value: Handler can be: *A JavaScript function in case of "Manual" UI Pattern processes. This function is invoked when the process is executed. *An Java class implementing ActionHandler. This java class is invoked when the process is executed.
